Name: Container.Window
Desc: Creates a draggable, resizable window container with title bar and control buttons
LongDesc: The Container.Window plugin provides a draggable and resizable window container with a title bar and control buttons (minimize, maximize, close). It supports custom content, taskbar integration, and animated transitions. The window can be programmatically opened, closed, minimized, maximized, and restored.
Example: var win = Q.Container().Window({ title: 'My Window', content: 'Hello World' }); win.Open();
